attributes.action: involve children far more in how their schools are run
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment children are regarded as an incidental inconvenience and not at all asked about how thier schools are run or what thier opinions are. Im not saying that what the children say goes but at least do them the decency of considering what they have to say, their opinions are just as important as their teachers or parents because in the end everything that happens at the school will effect them.
